data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius - Chinese philosopher, politician

data.quote: There is nothing more powerful in the world than the idea that came in time.
data.author: Victor Hugo - French poet

data.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
data.author: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: Anyone can deal with victory. Only the mighty can bear defeat.
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
data.author: Woody Allen
